description: React component for a Tic-Tac-Toe game board, including game logic, AI move handling, and rendering UI elements.

methods.name: getOpponent
methods.description: Returns the opponent player symbol ('X' or 'O') based on the current player.

methods.name: getInitialBoard
methods.description: Initializes and returns an empty game board of size 3x3.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board for a winner and returns the winning player symbol ('X' or 'O') if any.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Determines if the game is a draw (full board with no winner).

methods.name: simpleAIMove
methods.description: A basic AI algorithm that picks the first empty cell as its move.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicking on a game cell, updates game state accordingly, and checks for game end conditions.

methods.name: handleRestart
methods.description: Resets the game to start a new round.

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Starts a new game, invoking callback and resetting state.
